vsParam:
Take it, Marjoram Sensei.
This is the medicine [px] made to relieve your hangover.

Oh my god!
It's a great help! Thank you!

With this... heehee, I can tell people
more about how adorable you are!

Haha... Now you got the medicine, but still,
don't drink too much...

Right, Marjoram Sensei~
... Whom do you drink with every day?
Oh, it's Bergamot... Ahem, Bergamot Sensei.

Huh—? Really!?
I don't think Bergamot Sensei drinks...

Uh, is that so? She often drinks with me.
But she's a lightweight.
No. She drinks with me, but she's a lightweight~

Hehe, she'll blush all over even with a little alcohol.
So she'll drink water after only one glass of wine.

Oh... Haha! I'd really like to see how Bergamot Sensei
looks when she flushes~

Hehe, she's very adorable~
Plus, she smiles a lot after she's drunk...

... Marjoram Sensei?
Don't you dare finish that sentence... Hehe. Hehehe...

Eeh!? Ah... Ah haha~ I didn't say anything!
You must've misheard... Ah hahaha...

... Good. Don't talk nonsense in front of students,
understood?

Sh-she's terrifying...
So much for this topic...

Yeah, right... About the rest, you'll find out
when you're old enough to drink with us. Hehe... ♪
